title: An Exact Inference Scheme for MinSAT.
abstract: We describe an exact inference-based algorithm for the MinSAT problem. Given a multiset of clauses θ, the algorithm derives as many empty clauses as the maximum number of clauses that can be falsified in θ by applying finitely many times an inference rule, and returns an optimal assignment. We prove the correctness of the algorithm, describe how it can be extended to deal with weighted Min-SAT and weighted partial MinSAT instances, analyze the differences between the MaxSAT and MinSAT inference schemes, and define and empirically evaluate the MinSAT Pure Literal Rule.
departments: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
